page.title: 13JOHN WRIGHT SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: JOHN WRIGHT SPORTS EAST KILBRIDE The John Wright Sports Centre is situated about half a mile from the town centre. It was opened in 1972. Here is a list of the facilities in the centre...indoor bowling,football, netball,volleyball,basketball,hand ball,racketball,boxing,weightlifting, trampolining,dancing,badminton,squash, hockey,table tennis,archery,snooker, darts,karate,judo,yoga,athletics and gymnastics. We did a survey in our Domesday group on how many people go to the sports centre. Our results were...once a week 32% once a month 18% hardly ever 43% never 7% We think its an excellent sports centre.
